channel.title: [RuneRewind] - Travel Back Into Time: Old-School Remake - We're back!
channel.description:
[CENTER][url=http://runerewind.com/index.php?PHPSESSID=04935b11a1a212de41ee7efb09e7e419&action=register][img]http://i.imgur.com/SldbN.png[/img][/url][url=http://runerewind.com/play/][img]http://i.imgur.com/u58wg.png[/img][/url][url=http://runerewind.com/index.php?action=forum][img]http://i.imgur.com/8cTJL.png[/img][/url][url=http://www.youtube.com/runerewind][img]http://i.imgur.com/cojqH.png[/img][/url]
Well before I dive into the whole advertisement, I'd like to start by saying thank you for taking the time to read this thread. Currently we don't have a lot of players as we're just getting back on our feet after a bit of hiatus. So please be patient and help us expand, we can't do this alone. For those of you who played Runerewind in the past, you won't be disappointed, especially to those of you who stuck by the project through it all, we're picking up right where we left off, aside from the obvious account restart to help us start fresh. Again, thank you for taking the time to read this and we hope to see you guys real soon! [IMG]http://img440.imageshack.us/img440/1848/infovy.png[/img] [b]Features![/b] - This server is online 24/7. - 3* experience rate. Example: if you were to get 4xp in a skill on RuneScape, you would get 12xp on this server. - No custom items or npc's. - Fantastic economy. - Friendly and approachable community and staff. - Stable server. - Webclient. - Working quests. - Active staff. - All free-to-play skills are working perfectly. - Sexy original gameframe. - Npc clipping base. - Np dialogue. - Honest staff. - So much more, you wouldn't even believe it! Come check us out now, register your account [URL=http://runerewind.com/index.php?action=forum]here.[/URL]
[b]Working Quest List![/b] [b]F2P Quests:[/b] -Cooks Assistant -Imp Catcher -Sheep Shearer -Rune Mysteries -Romeo and Juliet -Doric's Quest -Vampire Slayer -Restless Ghost -Witch's Potion -Black Knights Fortress -Ernest The Chicken -The Knights Sword -Demon Slayer -Goblin Diplomacy -Prince Ali Rescue -Pirate's Treasure -Shield of Arrav -Dragon Slayer
[b]Members Quests:[/b] -Lost City -Priest in Peril -Druidic Ritual -Gertrude's Cat -Tree Gnome Village
[b]More being added! So join today![/b]
[url=http://runerewind.com/index.php?PHPSESSID=04935b11a1a212de41ee7efb09e7e419&action=register][img]http://i.imgur.com/SldbN.png[/img][/url][url=http://runerewind.com/play/][img]http://i.imgur.com/u58wg.png[/img][/url][url=http://runerewind.com/index.php?action=forum][img]http://i.imgur.com/8cTJL.png[/img][/url][url=http://www.youtube.com/runerewind][img]http://i.imgur.com/cojqH.png[/img][/url][/CENTER]
Thank you for reading! - The Runerewind Staff.

item.dc:creator: @RuneRewind RuneRewind
item.description:
@RuneRewind wrote:

Mezzyscape562:

Server is very laggy.

I’m not sure why it would, everyone else seems to be without problem. D:

Kodiak:

Strangely, I’m glad you said “PVE”. I’m so tired of seeing ‘pvm’.

Thanks

item.title: [RuneRewind] - Travel Back Into Time: Old-School Remake - We're back!
item.dc:creator: @RuneRewind RuneRewind
item.description:
@RuneRewind wrote:

Fails:

RuneRewind, that’s a pretty catchy name, not going to lie. All-in-all, I like the advertisement, it’s a very nice thread layout. I will definitely try this out in the near future. Great job.

Thank you, glad you like it! We look forward to seeing you :3

Read full topic

item.title: [RuneRewind] - Travel Back Into Time: Old-School Remake - We're back!
item.dc:creator: @RuneRewind RuneRewind
item.description:
@RuneRewind wrote:

Null Amount:

Nice advertisement 9/10. Not sure about the uniqueness of the server though. I’ll check it out some-time.

Team_Rocket:

I like the Advertisement format and overall Advertisement. I can’t speak for the gameplay quality though, but it seems on par with the other '06 re-makes. I also like the fact that it seems to be polite and the type of Private Server which treats It’s Players as precious eggs (which all should).

Thank you both for your feed back, as I stated we’re still working on a player base, but you have to start somewhere.

Read full topic
item.source: [RuneRewind] - Travel Back Into Time: Old-School Remake - We're back!

item.title: [RuneRewind] - Travel Back Into Time: Old-School Remake - We're back!
item.dc:creator: @RuneRewind RuneRewind
item.description:
@RuneRewind wrote:

[CENTER]

Well before I dive into the whole advertisement, I’d like to start by saying thank you for taking the time to read this thread. Currently we don’t have a lot of players as we’re just getting back on our feet after a bit of hiatus. So please be patient and help us expand, we can’t do this alone.
For those of you who played Runerewind in the past, you won’t be disappointed, especially to those of you who stuck by the project through it all, we’re picking up right where we left off, aside from the obvious account restart to help us start fresh.
Again, thank you for taking the time to read this and we hope to see you guys real soon!

Features!

  • This server is online 24/7.
  • 3* experience rate. Example: if you were to get 4xp in a skill on RuneScape, you would get 12xp on this server.
  • No custom items or npc’s.
  • Fantastic economy.
  • Friendly and approachable community and staff.
  • Stable server.
  • Webclient.
  • Working quests.
  • Active staff.
  • All free-to-play skills are working perfectly.
  • Sexy original gameframe.
  • Npc clipping base.
  • Np dialogue.
  • Honest staff.
  • So much more, you wouldn’t even believe it! Come check us out now, register your account here.

Working Quest List!
F2P Quests:
-Cooks Assistant
-Imp Catcher
-Sheep Shearer
-Rune Mysteries
-Romeo and Juliet
-Doric’s Quest
-Vampire Slayer
-Restless Ghost
-Witch’s Potion
-Black Knights Fortress
-Ernest The Chicken
-The Knights Sword
-Demon Slayer
-Goblin Diplomacy
-Prince Ali Rescue
-Pirate’s Treasure
-Shield of Arrav
-Dragon Slayer

Members Quests:
-Lost City
-Priest in Peril
-Druidic Ritual
-Gertrude’s Cat
-Tree Gnome Village

More being added! So join today!

[/CENTER]

Thank you for reading!

  • The Runerewind Staff.

Read full topic
item.source: [RuneRewind] - Travel Back Into Time: Old-School Remake - We're back!
